item.title: Frank Price, Former Universal and Columbia Studio Head, Dies at 95
item.description: Veteran motion picture and television executive Frank Price, who had more than one go-round at both MCA/Universal and Columbia Pictures, died Monday in Santa Monica. He was 95. His son Roy Price, form
